腰.definition: the waist and lower back; (bound form) kidney of an animal (as food); the waist of trousers or a skirt; (metonym) money pouch; pocket; (bound form) the middle section of an upright object (mountain, bottle etc)

腰包.definition: waist purse (old); (fig.) purse; pocket; waist pack; fanny pack; bum bag

腰封.definition: wide belt; sash; (packaging) paper sash around a book or other product

腰斬.definition: to chop sb in half at the waist (capital punishment); to cut sth in half; to reduce sth by a dramatic margin; to terminate; to cut short

腰桿.definition: (a person's) back (usu. as sth one keeps straight); (fig.) backing; support

腰桿子.definition: waist; small of the back; (fig.) backing

腰椎間盤突出.pinyin: yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1
腰椎間盤突出.definition: slipped disk; vertebral herniation; prolapsed disk

腰椎間盤突出症.pinyin: yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1 zheng4

腰纏萬貫.definition: lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money; extremely wealthy; loaded

腰金衣紫.definition: golden seal at the waist, purple gown (idiom); in official position

腰鼓.definition: waist drum; waist-drum dance (Han ethnic group folk dance)
